text: Vernon Adair Benson (September 19, 1924 â€“ January 20, 2014) was an American baseball player. He was an infielder/outfielder, coach, scout and interim manager in American Major League Baseball. Benson died on January 20, 2014 in Granite Quarry, North Carolina from natural causes at the age of 89.Vernon Benson obituary ==References== ==Other websites== *Retrosheet *Venezuelan Baseball League Category:1924 births Category:2014 deaths Category:St. Louis Cardinals players Category:Sportspeople from North Carolina
